import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './GallerySection.css'; const GallerySection = () => { const [selectedItem, setSelectedItem] = useState(null); const galleryItems = [ { id: 1, title: "Neural Scan 001", type: "scan", status: "classified" }, { id: 2, title: "Defense Matrix", type: "system", status: "active" }, { id: 3, title: "AI Threat Vector", type: "analysis", status: "warning" }, { id: 4, title: "Cognitive Shield", type: "protection", status: "online" }, { id: 5, title: "Brain Firewall", type: "security", status: "deployed" }, { id: 6, title: "Memory Protection", type: "backup", status: "secure" }, { id: 7, title: "Thought Encryption", type: "cipher", status: "encrypted" }, { id: 8, title: "Neural Antibody", type: "defense", status: "active" }, { id: 9, title: "Mind Fortress", type: "barrier", status: "fortified" }, { id: 10, title: "Synaptic Guard", type: "monitor", status: "watching" }, { id: 11, title: "Consciousness Lock", type: "security", status: "locked" }, { id: 12, title: "Mental Quarantine", type: "isolation", status: "contained" } ]; const getStatusColor = (status) => { const colors = { classified: '#ff0000', active: '#00ff41', warning: '#ffff00', online: '#00ff41', deployed: '#00ff41', secure: '#00ff41', encrypted: '#ff0000', fortified: '#00ff41', watching: '#ffff00', locked: '#ff0000', contained: '#ff0000' }; return colors[status] || '#00ff41'; }; return (

VISUAL ARCHIVES

ARCHIVE STATUS: OPERATIONAL ITEMS: {galleryItems.length} CLASSIFICATION: TOP SECRET
{galleryItems.map((item) => (
setSelectedItem(item)} >
{item.title}
{item.type.toUpperCase()}
‚óè {item.status.toUpperCase()}
))}
{selectedItem && (
setSelectedItem(null)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

{selectedItem.title}

üìÅ

Content slot available

Ready for your media upload

Type: {selectedItem.type}
Status: {selectedItem.status}
Classification: TOP SECRET
)}
); }; export default GallerySection;
